overview: Rayveness: When the boys find themselves in trouble the parents get together and hammer things out. Chastity Lynn: Scott's not allowed to play with Billy anymore and classmate Chastity wants to prove that girls can be fun too. Lexi Diamond: Sister Lexi visits Billy to drop off his things when she discovers he's a lot hotter when not hanging with her nerdy brother. Ally Kay: Dad finally has the house to himself but Lexi's friend Ally pops in and catches him with his cock in his hand. Rayveness: Billy builds up the courage to go apologize to Scott's mom when she decides to teach the young stud a lesson he'll never forget.
title: Filthy Family 2
